item.title: About OpenID connect
item.description: Rhize uses OpenIDConnect to connect to a Keycloak server to authenticate users and manage Role-based access controls. Open ID Connect is a security architecture that uses JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) to access secured resources. JWT are issued by KeyCloak, and the users can be managed in KeyCloak, or managed in other services like LDAP, Google, Azure AD, Facebook, etc. When a user accesses the user interface, the UI redirects to Keycloak.
